name: Determinant Tic Tac Toe
description: In Determinant Tic-Tac-Toe, you play with 1's and 0's instead of X's and O's. 1's go first, and their goal is to make the determinant of the matrix non-zero, while 0's goal is to make the determinant 0. Play continues until the matrix is full. You can play against other players locally, against a random opponent, or against the best possible opponent (Minimax). Watch the accompanying video for more info on how to win and who can win!
